title: An appendix to the answer unto two Athenian Mercuries concerning pedo-baptism containing twenty seven syllogistical arguments proving infant-baptism a mere humane tradition : the gentlmen called the Athenian Society desiring in the last of the said Mercuries to have syllogism  / by B. K.
author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.
publisher: Printed for the author and sold by John Harris ...,
notes: Written by Benjamin Keach.  Cf. Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
